p: The total color difference (ΔE) was calculated using the following equation: ΔE = [(L* − L’) 2 + (a* − a’) 2 + (b* − b’) 2] 1/2 (1) where L*, a* and b* are the color parameter values of the sample and L’, a’ and b’ are the color parameter values of the standard white plate used as the film background (L’ = 66.39, a’ = −0.74, b’ = 1.25). The analyses were conducted in five repetitions. A mean value recorded for the top side and bottom side is reported.
